OfflineAudioCompletionEvent.summary: The Web Audio API OfflineAudioCompletionEvent interface represents events that occur when the processing of an is terminated. The event uses this interface.

blockquote.para: This interface is marked as deprecated; it is still supported for legacy reasons, but it will soon be superseded when the promise version of is supported in browsers, which will no longer need it.

OfflineAudioCompletionEventOfflineAudioC.summary:
The OfflineAudioCompletionEvent() constructor of the Web Audio API creates a new
object.

blockquote.para:
You wouldn't generally use the constructor manually.
OfflineAudioCompletionEvent events are dispatched to
instances for legacy reasons.

OfflineAudioCompletionEventRenderedBuffe.summary:
The renderedBuffer read-only property of the
interface is an
containing the result of processing an .
